EmailTemplate.name: TSE-2016-03-09-Turbofest-Silicon-Valley.Email-Thank You Survey
EmailTemplate.subject: Take Our #VMTurbofest Survey For A Green Circle T-Shirt
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/turbofest-sv-2016]]> Hi {{Lead.First Name}},
Thank you immensely for joining us yesterday at Turbofest Silicon Valley. Please take this 2-minute survey <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/turbofest-sv-2016]]> to provide feedback on how we can improve future Turbofests for you and your colleagues.
For your time, you will receive 1,000 Green Circle Community Points, redeemable for Green Circle Community T-Shirt!
Questions, comments, concerns, or control - just let us know. See you next year.
Sincerely, The VMTurbo Team
#VMTurbofest It's A Bird. It's a Plane. It's Your Shirt.
<[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/turbofest-sv-2016]]>
Give Us Feedback <[[https://www.surveymonkey.com/r/turbofest-sv-2016]]>
